StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetOCSClassAssignments]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @NwaID int ) AS
SELECT [OCS_ID] ,[NWA_ID] ,[SCHEDULED_SHIP_DATE] ,[COMPONENT_CODE] ,[OCS_CLASS_ID] ,[PEBD] ,[REPORT_DATE] ,[ACCESSION_SUBMITTED] ,[CLASS_RESULT_CODE] ,[CLASS_RESULT_DATE] ,[CLASS_STANDING] ,[CLASS_AVERAGE] ,[DROP_REASON] ,[TRAINING_DROP_WEEK] ,[ACADEMIC_AVERAGE] ,[MILITARY_SKILLS_AVERAGE] ,[LEADERSHIP_AVERAGE] ,[CLASS_COMMENTS] ,[JOIN_TYPE] ,[COMPANY] ,[PLATOON] ,[NOTICE_OF_ELIGIBILITY] ,[AIRLINE] ,[FLIGHT_NUMBER] ,[ARRIVAL_DATE] ,[GOV_POV] ,[DISPLAY_RECORD] ,[TRAINING_TYPE_CODE] ,[CLASS_NUMBER] ,[FISCAL_YEAR] ,[CLASS_END_DATE] ,[CLASS_BEGIN_DATE] FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[OCS] WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [mcriss].[dbo].[OCS_CLASS] ON [OCS].[OCS_CLASS_ID] = [OCS_CLASS].[CLASS_ID] WHERE NWA_ID = @NwaID ORDER BY [CLASS_BEGIN_DATE]
